meanings.definition: A member of a religious community living in common.
meanings.sent1: The cenobites in the monastery work together to maintain the gardens.
meanings.sent2: The cenobites gather every evening for prayers in the chapel.
meanings.sent3: The cenobites decided to have a potluck dinner to celebrate their successful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The cenobites are like a big family, sharing everything they have.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cenobites working side by side is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A person who lives in a religious community.
meanings.sent1: My aunt is a cenobite who has dedicated her life to serving others in her convent.
meanings.sent2: The cenobites wake up early every morning for their communal prayers.
meanings.sent3: The cenobites organized a charity event to help those in need in the community.
meanings.sent4: Living as a cenobite requires a deep commitment to faith and community.
meanings.sent5: The cenobites' peaceful way of life is a source of comfort to many.
